channel.title: Technical Debt on Awaiting Bits
channel.description: Recent content in Technical Debt on Awaiting Bits

item.title: NDepend, a powerful static analysis tool for .NET
item.description: Patrick Smacchia, the author of NDepend, offered me a license for NDepend and I was thrilled, as I was always interested in it. In this blog post, I’ll be talking about my opinion and thoughts after trying it for the first time. Static code analysis Being able to check the quality of your source code before it’s even ran is a very valuable thing to have.
